name: Idle Jelly
description:
Idle Jelly Demo

This is an early test demo for Idle Jelly!

Game is still in alpha state, so it is not complete and anything could change! Don't expect complete quality just yet, but enjoy what there is of the demo!

Game state is now first Public Alpha 0.90;

This is the first public alpha in celebration of the 4th of July!!

Feel free to leave a constructive like, comment or suggestion! Enjoy!
